featured.text: It was carried on sailing ships around the world because it was found to help prevent scurvy, a disease that often 25 sailors on long voyages.

definition.zh_def: 壞血病，一種由於缺乏維生素C而引起的疾病，特徵包括疲勞、牙齦出血和皮膚問題。
definition.en_def: A disease caused by a deficiency of vitamin C, characterized by fatigue, bleeding gums, and skin issues.
definition.example: Sailors in the past often suffered from scurvy due to a lack of fresh fruits and vegetables.
